mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sf_est_investment_other_cost_rate_diret_store ( AUTO_NO, ROW_ID, INVESTMENT_ID, WRAPPAGE_FEE_RATE, ACCESSORIES_FEE_RATE, PROMOTION_FEE_RATE, EX_LABOR_FEE_RATE, CLOTHES_MAKEUP_FEE_RATE, MAINTENANCE_FEE_RATE, DATA_TRAFFICE_FEE_RATE, OFFICE_FEE_RATE, POS_PROCEDURES_FEE_RATE, GOODS_SURPLUS_FEE_RATE, TRAVE_FEE_RATE, BUSINESS_FEE_RATE, OTHER_CONTROL_FEE_RATE, PRE_OPEN_FEE_RATE, TRANSIT_FEE_RATE, LOGISTICS_FEE_RATE, LICENSE_FEE_RATE, AD_FEE_RATE, OTHER_SUNDRY_FEE_RATE, CLOSE_LOSE_FEE_RATE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3, DEF4, DEF5, DEF6, DEF7, DEF8, DEF9, DEF10 ) VALUES ( #{autoNo}, #{rowId}, #{investmentId}, #{wrappageFeeRate}, #{accessoriesFeeRate}, #{promotionFeeRate}, #{exLaborFeeRate}, #{clothesMakeupFeeRate}, #{maintenanceFeeRate}, #{dataTrafficeFeeRate}, #{officeFeeRate}, #{posProceduresFeeRate}, #{goodsSurplusFeeRate}, #{traveFeeRate}, #{businessFeeRate}, #{otherControlFeeRate}, #{preOpenFeeRate}, #{transitFeeRate}, #{logisticsFeeRate}, #{licenseFeeRate}, #{adFeeRate}, #{otherSundryFeeRate}, #{closeLoseFeeRate}, #{creator}, sysdate(), #{updater}, sysdate(), #{delFlag}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{def7}, #{def8}, #{def9}, #{def10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_OTHER_COST_RATE_DIRET_STORE SET INVESTMENT_ID = #{investmentId}, WRAPPAGE_FEE_RATE = #{wrappageFeeRate}, ACCESSORIES_FEE_RATE = #{accessoriesFeeRate}, PROMOTION_FEE_RATE = #{promotionFeeRate}, EX_LABOR_FEE_RATE = #{exLaborFeeRate}, CLOTHES_MAKEUP_FEE_RATE = #{clothesMakeupFeeRate}, MAINTENANCE_FEE_RATE = #{maintenanceFeeRate}, DATA_TRAFFICE_FEE_RATE = #{dataTrafficeFeeRate}, OFFICE_FEE_RATE = #{officeFeeRate}, POS_PROCEDURES_FEE_RATE = #{posProceduresFeeRate}, GOODS_SURPLUS_FEE_RATE = #{goodsSurplusFeeRate}, TRAVE_FEE_RATE = #{traveFeeRate}, BUSINESS_FEE_RATE = #{businessFeeRate}, OTHER_CONTROL_FEE_RATE = #{otherControlFeeRate}, PRE_OPEN_FEE_RATE = #{preOpenFeeRate}, TRANSIT_FEE_RATE = #{transitFeeRate}, LOGISTICS_FEE_RATE = #{logisticsFeeRate}, LICENSE_FEE_RATE = #{licenseFeeRate}, AD_FEE_RATE = #{adFeeRate}, OTHER_SUNDRY_FEE_RATE = #{otherSundryFeeRate}, CLOSE_LOSE_FEE_RATE = #{closeLoseFeeRate}, UPDATER = #{updater}, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate(), DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag}, DEF1 = #{def1}, DEF2 = #{def2}, DEF3 = #{def3}, DEF4 = #{def4}, DEF5 = #{def5}, DEF6 = #{def6}, DEF7 = #{def7}, DEF8 = #{def8}, DEF9 = #{def9}, DEF10 = #{def10} WHERE ROW_ID = #{rowId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_ID, INVESTMENT_ID, WRAPPAGE_FEE_RATE, ACCESSORIES_FEE_RATE, PROMOTION_FEE_RATE, EX_LABOR_FEE_RATE, CLOTHES_MAKEUP_FEE_RATE, MAINTENANCE_FEE_RATE, DATA_TRAFFICE_FEE_RATE, OFFICE_FEE_RATE, POS_PROCEDURES_FEE_RATE, GOODS_SURPLUS_FEE_RATE, TRAVE_FEE_RATE, BUSINESS_FEE_RATE, OTHER_CONTROL_FEE_RATE, PRE_OPEN_FEE_RATE, TRANSIT_FEE_RATE, LOGISTICS_FEE_RATE, LICENSE_FEE_RATE, AD_FEE_RATE, OTHER_SUNDRY_FEE_RATE, CLOSE_LOSE_FEE_RATE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3, DEF4, DEF5, DEF6, DEF7, DEF8, DEF9, DEF10 FROM T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_OTHER_COST_RATE_DIRET_STORE where ROW_ID = #{rowId}

SELECT AUTO_NO, ROW_ID, INVESTMENT_ID, WRAPPAGE_FEE_RATE, ACCESSORIES_FEE_RATE, PROMOTION_FEE_RATE, EX_LABOR_FEE_RATE, CLOTHES_MAKEUP_FEE_RATE, MAINTENANCE_FEE_RATE, DATA_TRAFFICE_FEE_RATE, OFFICE_FEE_RATE, POS_PROCEDURES_FEE_RATE, GOODS_SURPLUS_FEE_RATE, TRAVE_FEE_RATE, BUSINESS_FEE_RATE, OTHER_CONTROL_FEE_RATE, PRE_OPEN_FEE_RATE, TRANSIT_FEE_RATE, LOGISTICS_FEE_RATE, LICENSE_FEE_RATE, AD_FEE_RATE, OTHER_SUNDRY_FEE_RATE, CLOSE_LOSE_FEE_RATE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3, DEF4, DEF5, DEF6, DEF7, DEF8, DEF9, DEF10 FROM T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_OTHER_COST_RATE_DIRET_STORE where INVESTMENT_ID = #{investmentId}

SELECT AUTO_NO, ROW_ID, INVESTMENT_ID, WRAPPAGE_FEE_RATE, ACCESSORIES_FEE_RATE, PROMOTION_FEE_RATE, EX_LABOR_FEE_RATE, CLOTHES_MAKEUP_FEE_RATE, MAINTENANCE_FEE_RATE, DATA_TRAFFICE_FEE_RATE, OFFICE_FEE_RATE, POS_PROCEDURES_FEE_RATE, GOODS_SURPLUS_FEE_RATE, TRAVE_FEE_RATE, BUSINESS_FEE_RATE, OTHER_CONTROL_FEE_RATE, PRE_OPEN_FEE_RATE, TRANSIT_FEE_RATE, LOGISTICS_FEE_RATE, LICENSE_FEE_RATE, AD_FEE_RATE, OTHER_SUNDRY_FEE_RATE, CLOSE_LOSE_FEE_RATE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3, DEF4, DEF5, DEF6, DEF7, DEF8, DEF9, DEF10 FROM T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_OTHER_COST_RATE_DIRET_STORE
